groupValues.description: 0: No group, 1..10 : groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, 11..20: R-groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, +100 : Banker selection
0: No group, 1..10 : groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, 11..20: R-groups A, B, C, D, AB, AC, AD, BC, BD, CD, +100 : Banker selection

get.summary: This method gets the L10 Serial Number and returns the L5 Serial Number
This method gets the L5 Serial Number and returns the Betslip Id

post.summary: This method is used to create a new session

delete.summary: Closes the active session and creates the voucher's serial number

verification.description: if true, CS will verify if the actual deposit is possible. No changes to the session balance will take place.if false (default value), CS will proceed to the actual deposit.

post.summary: This method deposits the requested amount to the active session
This method reserves the requested amount from the active session

delete.summary: Closes the active shift of the terminal.

post.summary: Registers terminal to the system with status 'sign-off'
Registers terminal to the system with status 'sign-on'

get.summary: Retrieves brand name for the specific retailer
